channel.title: Comments on: Accessibility Camp DC Recap

item.title: By: 2nd Annual Accessibility Camp DC » Conference » Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: 2nd Annual Accessibility Camp DC » Conference » Russell Heimlich
item.description: [...] = "rc:6"; October 13th, 2010 2nd Annual Accessibility Camp DCLast October was the first ever Accessibility Camp DC. I learned a lot from the talks last year and had my eyes opened by how the blind navigate the web. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] = "rc:6"; October 13th, 2010 2nd Annual Accessibility Camp DCLast October was the first ever Accessibility Camp DC. I learned a lot from the talks last year and had my eyes opened by how the blind navigate the web. […]

item.title: By: patrick timony
item.dc:creator: patrick timony
item.description:
The November 17th Accessibility DC meeting will be in room 215 at the Martin Luther King Jr. Memorial Library from 6pm to 9pm. The eventbrite signup is here: http://accessibilitydcnov09.eventbrite.com/
Patrick
item.content:encoded:
The November 17th Accessibility DC meeting will be in room 215 at the Martin Luther King Jr. Memorial Library from 6pm to 9pm. The eventbrite signup is here:
http://accessibilitydcnov09.eventbrite.com/

Patrick

item.title: By: eLearning tools
item.dc:creator: eLearning tools
item.description: Wow, looks like you guys had fun alright. Now I think I'm going to join this coming November.
item.content:encoded: Wow, looks like you guys had fun alright. Now I think I’m going to join this coming November.
